attributes.action: OPEN THE NOTTINGHAM CITY CENTRE ONE WAY SYSTEM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TRAFFIC IN NOTTINGHAM CITY CENTRE IS TERRIBLE, WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO DRIVE INTO THE CITY CENTRE FOR ANY REASON WITHOUT BEING FINED. IT IS TERRIBLE. ITS NOW BEEN TURNED INTO A ONE WAY AREA WHICH CAUSES DIFFICULTY FOR EVERYBODY.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
